Writer: René Goscinny (comic book "Astérix et Cléopatre"), Albert Uderzo (comic book "Astérix et Cléopatre"), Alain Chabat (screenplay)
Title: Asterix and Obelix Meet Cleopatra
Actors: Gérard Depardieu, Christian Clavier, Jamel Debbouze, Monica Bellucci
Plot: Astérix and Obélix go to Egypt to help architect Numérobis who is building a palace for Cleopatra.
